info.name: DIM - Bright Tag Colors
info.description: Makes the tags more visible and easier to differentiate at a glance by adding bright, unique colors to each one.
info.additionalInfo:
— All tags have different colors (Favorite: BLUE, Keep: AQUA, Infuse: MAGENTA, Junk: RED)
— Colors are much brighter
— Tags have harder drop shadows to contrast with background
